snippet: Mayor Bob Filner refused to resign in response to sexual harassment accusations leveled by prominent allies.
abstract: San Diego Mayor Bob Filner apologizes for his treatment of women who had worked in his office, but refuses to resign in response to sexual harassment accusations leveled by prominent allies.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bob Filner refused to resign in response to sexual harassment accusations leveled by prominent allies.

headline.main: Mayor of San Diego Apologizes Over Treatment of Women
headline.print_headline: California: Mayor of San Diego Apologizes Over Treatment of Women
